title: Core FTP Pro v2.2.1879
description:
Core FTP Pro v2.2.1879

Version 2.2 (build 1879), updated June 1st, 2016 

Connection type HTTP/HTTPS fixes (problems in x64 versions) 
SFTP negotiation fixes/updates (diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha1) 
"cancel/abort" button long delays fixed 
File based configuration updates too frequent in Site Manager, fixed 
FTP directory listing fixes 
SFTP upload "disconnect" bug from build 1878 fixed 

FTP client software for Windows
	
PRO licensing additional features:

Zip compression / decompression - zip up your files on the fly before transfer 
Scheduling of transfers and templates - for web page updating or backup to ftp servers 
Encryption - decryption of files for extra security 
Auto uploading of files 
Connect:Enterprise support 
GXS ICS support 
IBM Information Exchange (IE) support 
Tumbleweed / SecureTransport support 
Templates for common or repetitive tasks 
Additional utilities including Ping & TraceRoute 
External program execution (for AV, etc) 
Email notification of transfer status 
No splash screen for command line tasks 
Discounts on future products and upgrades 
Top priority support!
